metadata.title: CVE-2025-21687 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vfio/platform: check the bounds of read/write syscallscount and offset are passed from user space and not checked, onlyoffset is capped to 40 bits, which can be used to read/write out ofbounds of the device.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2025-21687` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required
